summary: Nick is a district attorney investigating several deaths of AIDS sufferers in the gay community of New York City's Chelsea District. Each case suggest the use of assisted suicide, which is illegal in New York.
cast: Joanna Adler|Chris Barry|Walter Borden|Ray Brimicombe|Laura Cahoot|Brent Carver|Linda Carvery|Rejean Cournoyer|Lucy Decoutere|Richard Donat|Chase Duffy|Olympia Dukakis|Tim Dunn|Travis Ferris|Thom Fitzgerald|Robert Fucito|Ian Gilmore|Glen Grant|Steven Hillyer|Celeste Jankowski|Dick Latessa|Jane Leeves|Tim Marback|Gianna Marciante|Jaclyn Markowitz|Vicky McCarty|Don McKellar|Ruth Moore|Carla Morton|Ken Nagami|Marcia Olsen|Joan Orenstein|Doug Pettigrew|Sarah Polley|Parker Posey|Cynthia Preston|Walker Richards|Susan Sayle|Jamie Stevens|Studio|Darryl Tannahill|Chaz Thorne|Miss Vicky|Cecil Wright|Mike Younger|Theresa Zong|Christina Zorich|Don Bottomley|Lawrence Willett
title: The Event
